name: ndshell
description: A CLI to bring scripts, binaries, and packager commands to your fingertips (inspired by nix-shell)
author: vandesm14

scripts.compile: deno compile mod.ts -o ./bin/node-shell-init --allow-all && chmod +x ./bin/node-shell-init && cp ./lib/node-shell ./bin && chmod +x ./bin/node-shell
scripts.start: npm run compile && PATH=$PATH:./bin bash node-shell
